issue.title: Resources'title are not appearing in multilingual context
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

If the user choose a Joomla frontoffice language different from those defined as CATALOG languages, the resource's type titles are not displayed in resources management form (and probably in other frontoffice forms).

In addition, list of resources are not displayed if user frontend interface is not part of easysdi languages.

One solution could be to display the resource's type title when user language is different from the CATALOG defined languages.
Below, one sample when CATALOG languages are french/german and user language is english (resource's type are well defined in backoffice but nothing appears...)
!empty_resources.png!

Adding to this, metadata edition interface don't work correctly when frontoffice user language is not one of those defined for metadata language. Which logical should be applied when user language doesn't fit one of the metadata language(s) ?

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Constraint added in wiki https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/wiki/4_catalog_configuration
Reject the issue
